subject: Physics
goals: Understand basic concepts of kinematics, including displacement, velocity, and acceleration.
milestones: 1. Complete the reading on kinematics. 2. Solve initial kinematic equations. 3. Conduct a quick online quiz on basic kinematics concepts.

learning_tasks.task: Watch an online video explaining the concepts of displacement, velocity, and acceleration.
Summarize the definitions and equations of displacement, velocity, and acceleration in your own words.

practice_tasks.task: Solve 5 basic kinematic problems from the textbook.
Complete an online quiz on kinematics concepts.

resources: 1. Physics textbook (Chapter on Kinematics). 2. Online video tutorial from Khan Academy on Kinematics. 3. Kinematic problem sets from school-assigned workbook. 4. Free online quiz on kinematics from a reputable physics education website.
